DataElement.preferredName: Patient Concurrent Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Related to current or planned enrollement in a concurrent trial for eligibility

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Concurrent Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Occurring or operating at the same time._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria._The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Concurrent Enrollment Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring or operating at the same time.:The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Occurring or operating at the same time.
The act of registration, entering in a list, catalog, group, study; also, the number of subjects enrolled.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current or planned enrollment on another interventional symptom management study protocol, as per patient self-report or research staff members' knowledge at the time of consent. Concurrent participation in treatment or imaging studies is allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1805CDv2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current, planned enrollment, or in follow-up on another interventional symptom management study protocol, as per patient self-report or research staff members' knowledge at the time of consent. Concurrent participation in treatment or imaging studies is allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: WF1805CD
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current, or planned enrollment, or in follow-up on another interventional symptom management study protocol, as per patient self-report or research staff members' knowledge at the time of consent. Concurrent participation in treatment or imaging studies is allowed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG-ACRIN - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently enrolled in another clinical trial that is incompatible with this study's surveillance schema and follow-up regimen?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 7/20/23 removed special characters from PQT and AQT_mmt
